title: Thank you!
comment: 5 stars. For me, a blue accent colour to the soft nav keys would have been the icing on the cake 😀

title: The best free / dark theme.
comment: Excellent work. Elegant color choices. Clean animations. No fancy/jarring effects on tap/select. Keyboard is perfect. Black background on dial pad is perfect. Way better than those lameass Bhatia black themes that you have to pay for. Even better than the paid for Less Ugly themes. The right blend of gray, black and blue.

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what I was looking for, was mainly just looking to change my SMS look from light to dark theme, this perfect, with other themes everything would go to dark, this theme is very minimal, thank you

title: Only dark theme without major flaws
comment: Every other dark theme I've tried has some spots with dark gray font on black or even invisible black on black. All I ever needed with these themes is a dark messaging app but I have to trade off usability elsewhere to get that. Your theme on the other hand is highly functional and designed in good taste! Thanks.

title: The theme I've been looking for
comment: This theme has everything I've been looking for in a CM11 theme for ages. The holo dark and blue color palette is present in the entire system UI. There is no white on white shading, like many indecent themes. You've done a spectacular job. All I ask is that you theme the status bar, all of the quick settings tiles (like the battery one) and all of the Google apps, as well. The theme will be perfect that way.

title: Simply Great.
comment: Just what I was looking for. This subtle theme adds useful and eye appealing colors. It would be even better if the status bar were blue too...Excellent job for the most part!

title: AMAZING theme
comment: Well worth the money, oh wait, it's FREE! This theme is much better than most paid themes out there! Great work, thanks for sharing buddy!

title: Love it but......
comment: Any chance of reuploading this but without the statusbar themed? Thanks. Edit: Reply from the dev, 5th Star added looking forward to the update, I missed the holo blue KK grey got old fast!
